description: STRING No. 63 // From 2020-10-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // This painting resembles a landscape that is somehow morphed and set up in a distorted grid. It was done during research in Artificial Intelligence and computer-generated landscapes. This painting is an attempt to process the findings. The flower-like symbols are interpretations of Merkle Trees.
materials: silkscreen paint base and interference paint on canvas
name: I Owe yoU IV/IV
